Represents: The change in stress an employee has/ perceives

The relations between the employees/ how employees perceive
Increases if stress is lower, decreases if stress is higher

The satisfaction of the employees
Increases if stress is low and/or relations are better, decreases if stress is high and/or relations are worse

The motivation of the employees
Increases if relations are better and/or satisfaction is higher, decreases if reltions are worse and/or satisfaction is lower
